definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: I thought of the early polar explorers as I braced myself for the walk.
sentences.chinese: 当我缩起身子走路时想起了早期的极地探险者。

sentences.english: Inevitably her exploits were exaggerated and she became known as an adventuress .
sentences.chinese: 难免会夸大她的勇敢行为，她成了有名的探险者。

sentences.english: They were up on Mesa Verde. Spanish explorers had named the area.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙探险者已经给这一片地区取名为梅萨维德。

sentences.english: The explorers paddled their canoe cautiously upstream.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们谨慎地把独木舟向上游划去。

sentences.english: Yes, I was with my girlfriend Lamia. The Frontior set sail with many other adventurers besides Lamia…
sentences.chinese: 恩，我和我女朋友一起，还有其他探险者在船上。

sentences.english: I get to be an explorer like the nineteenth-century explorers.
sentences.chinese: 我想成为一个像十九世纪探险家一样的探险者。

sentences.english: The explorers dared the dangers of the ice north.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们敢于冒北方冰雪严寒的危险。

sentences.english: An explorer descends into the Majlis al Jinn cave in Oman.
sentences.chinese: 一位探险者绳降进入到阿曼的马吉里斯尔金洞穴。

sentences.english: A spelunker's scale model carl sbad.
sentences.chinese: 一个洞穴探险者卡尔斯巴德的成比例的模型。

sentences.english: The explorers sat on stumps to have a rest.
sentences.chinese: 探险者坐在树墩上休息。

sentences.english: The explorers searched for the source of the river.
sentences.chinese: 探险者找到了这条河的源头。

sentences.english: A canyoneer endures the deluge of a waterfall in Empress Canyon.
sentences.chinese: 皇后峡谷中，一名探险者顶着瀑布慢慢下降。

sentences.english: In this spirit of other explorers, the answer seems obvious.
sentences.chinese: 在其余探险者的脸上，答案似乎很明显。

sentences.english: Explorers traced the Nile River to its several headstreams in Central Africa.
sentences.chinese: 探险者在中非找到了尼罗河的几处源头。

sentences.english: Some prevision warned the explorer of trouble.
sentences.chinese: 某种预感警告探险者将有麻烦发生。

sentences.english: The explorers were faint from hunger and cold.
sentences.chinese: 探险者们因饥寒交迫而委顿不堪。

definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
Sven Hedin (1865-1952), famous Swedish adventurer and archaeologist, whose 1894-1900 Central Asian expeditions uncovered Kroraina or Loulan 樓蘭|楼兰
Nikolai Mikhailovich Przevalski (1839-1888), Russian explorer who made four expeditions to Central Asian from 1870/abbr. to 普氏
pinyin: Pu3 er3 re4 wa3 er3 si1 ji1

definition: Lop Nor, salt lake and nuclear testing site in Xinjiang
